oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Group photograph, 15,000th Curtiss-Wright Pursuit Plane
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Airmen from the Allied Air Forces gathered for the ceremony marking the 15,000th "pursuit plane" produced by the Curtiss-Wright Corporation for the military. A portion of the photograph has been torn away and the edges are very fragile.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; United States. Army. Air Corps; Curtiss-Wright aircraft; Air pilots
